description.brief: Python AX-12 Driver Manager and control script

package.description: This package contains a configurable driver manager node (manager.py) which can dynamically load one or more robot controllers (aka, driver plugins). Plugin Controllers are written to a specific driver manager interface, and they control Robotis Dynamixel AX-12+ servos. A driver control script provides calls to start, stop and restart a controller. This design is very similar to the experimental C++ nodelet.
package.author: UA Robotics Research Group
